# (Classical) Techniques

# Contrastive Learning

> Contrastive learning is a new learning paradigm.

- Oord, A. van den, Li, Y., & Vinyals, O. (2018). [Representation Learning with Contrastive Predictive Coding](https://arxiv.org/abs/1807.03748). In arXiv.
  
- **Momentum Contrast (MoCo)**: He, K., Fan, H., Wu, Y., Xie, S., & Girshick, R. B. (2020). [Momentum Contrast for Unsupervised Visual Representation Learning](https://openaccess.thecvf.com/content_CVPR_2020/html/He_Momentum_Contrast_for_Unsupervised_Visual_Representation_Learning_CVPR_2020_paper.html). CVPR.
  
- **SimCLR**: Chen, T., Kornblith, S., Norouzi, M., & Hinton, G. E. (2020). [A Simple Framework for Contrastive Learning of Visual Representations](https://proceedings.mlr.press/v119/chen20j.html). ICML. https://doi.org/https://doi.org/10.48550/arXiv.2002.05709
  
- **CLIP**: Radford, A., Kim, J. W., Hallacy, C., Ramesh, A., Goh, G., Agarwal, S., Sastry, G., Askell, A., Mishkin, P., Clark, J., Krueger, G., & Sutskever, I. (2021). Learning Transferable Visual Models From Natural Language Supervision. ICML.
